--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> (OOC: I have to bring something to your attention, Logo. It's the 
fact that
> your taking a name that's already taken. I have a Predacon that has 
the name
> Venomous. I know it's not spelled the same but it says the same 
thing. The
> rules clearly read that you can't take a name tha has been taken. 
So, please
> change that. I don't want to be rude but it's the rules.)
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, October 19, 2000 7:34 PM
> Subject: ENTER VENOMESS
> 
> 
> > Name: Venomess
> > Alt mode: Rattle Snake
> > Colors: Basicly white, grey, and black
> > She looks kinda ninja-like, with snake parts covering her body 
like
> > clothes.
> > Weapons: Guns on her arms. Fangs that inject venom. Venom will 
send
> > most average BW bot into stasis, but not kill.
> > Alliegance: Predacon
> >
> > She was made on Cybertron, by the Predacon Council.  She was 
designed
> > to be a spy and assassin.  Her moto, SEEK,SEDUCE,DESTROY.  She had
> > killed many Maximal officails on Cybertron and was working her way
> > around to the top leaders.  She was the best in her field.  The
> > Predacon Council had made other bots for the same purpose as she, 
but
> > she had out done them all.  But because of her skill, a few of the
> > Predacon leaders felt she might become a threat to them.  She knew
> > too much and they now wanted rid of her.  She had just killed one 
of
> > the Maximal Council leaders and was then turned in by one of the
> > Predacon Council members.  She had to flee Cybertron or be 
exacuted.
> > But her programs of killing and information gathering were still
> > strong and for the Predacon cause despire the fact they betrayed 
her.
> > She stole a small transport ship and sped off from Cybertron.  She
> > didn't know if she would ever return, but for now, the further 
away
> > she got, the safer she felt.
> >
> > She was deep into space, when a black hole opened up infront of 
her
> > ship.  Seconds later, her ship was sucked into the vortex of 
space.
> > She tried to fight, but the ship couldn't break free.  She blacked
> > out from the g-forces of the black hole as the ship was sucked in.
> >
> > Her ship finally flew throught the hole in space and ended up near
> > the solor system on Earth.  Her ship had lost power and engine 
drive
> > while in the black hole.  The only systems that remained active 
were
> > life support.  She was in stasis lock at the helm of the ship.  AS
> > the ship drifted past the planets, it was hit by space debre and
> > rubble.  Small meteors collided and smashed parts of the exterior
> > drive system and parts of the navigational systems.  The ship
> > evertually drifted near earth, where the gravitational pull had
> > started to pull the ship into the earth's atmosphere.  The ship 
fell
> > from the sky and landed  100 yards from the Allience base.  The
> > transport ship was about the size of the NASA Space shuttle.
> >
> > Venomess was still out cold, her body slumped over the control
> > console.  Her body bruised but for the most part, undamaged.  The
> > ship had sustained a lot of damage and would never fly again. 
Smoke
> > poured out of the tail and engine rooms.  The wings were torn off
> > upon impact.  One wing flew off and hit against the Allience ship.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
